title: Nadia Sawalha 'horrified' after Kaye Adams slipped into bed with her naked

Nadia Sawalha revealed that she was left horrified after fellow panelist Kaye Adams jumped into bed with her - naked.

Appearing on Loose Women today, Nadia wanted to ask the opinion of the other panelists on the show about what happened last night.

"I just want to ask you two because last night we had to share a hotel room," she said.

Kaye exclaimed: "Is there any privacy?!"

Nadia continued: "She - it's a double bed - gets into the bed starkers right and she says, 'oh, i hope you don't feel harassed!' and I went, 'Well no because she goes to bed naked'."

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Carol McGiffin wasn't impressed, saying: "It's sick!"

"But then it wasn't until the morning and I was thinking, 'If this was a topic on Loose Women and we'd be discussing it we'd be like, 'That's weird! Getting into bed naked,'" she said.

Kaye insisted: "I sleep in the nude! I've always slept naked."

"Don't you think it's weird she got into the bed with me nude?" Nadia asked Carol, who agreed that she thought it was weird.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

"But seriously, let's think this through," Kaye said. "What difference would that make to the experience?"

Carol replied: "What experience?!"

"I'm lying on my side of the bed, I'm quite quiet," Kaye said.

Nadia replied: "It was a double bed, you could have flipped your leg over me or anything!"

Kaye quipped: "You should be so lucky!"

Carol grimaced: "Don't, i can't unhear that!"

*Loose Women airs weekdays at 12.30pm on ITV
